def interest(p, r, n):
    return [round(p * i) for i in ((1 + (r * n)), (1 + r)**n)]

def interest(money, rate, periods):
    simple = money * (1 + rate * periods)
    compound = money * (1 + rate) ** periods
    return [round(simple), round(compound)]

def interest(p,r,n):
    return [round(p * (1 + (r * n))), round(p * (1 + r) ** n)]

def interest(p,r,t):
    return [round(p + p*r*t), round(p*(1 + r)**t)]

def interest(p, r, n):
    a = round(p + n*p*r)
    b = round(p*(1+r)**n)
    return [a, b]
